title: Customer Portal
subtitle: A dedicated place for your customers to view and manage their subscriptions, payment methods and recent transactions.

quickstart.title: Quick start
quickstart.subtitle: Embed customer portal into your website by copying the code snippet below:

origins.title: Allowed origins
origins.subtitle: Please list below the websites you’re planning to use customer portal on.

fmod.title: Frequency modification
fmod.subtitle: If enabled, your customers will be able to switch to a different payment schedule.
fmod.hint: Enter a valid JSONata query selecting the subscriptions these frequency modification rules will apply to. Please limit your expression to 200 characters.

ndmod.title: Next payment date modification
ndmod.subtitle: If enabled, your customers will be able to delay or advance the next payment.
ndmod.jsonataHint: Enter a valid JSONata query selecting the subscriptions these next date modification rules will apply to. Please limit your expression to 200 characters.

jwt.title: JWT secret
jwt.subtitle: A random alphanumeric string of 40-100 characters unique to your store used to authorize your customers.

session.title: Session duration
session.subtitle: Once a customer is logged in, we won’t ask for their email and password again for this period of time (up to 4 weeks).
